original_text: (Formerly he was useless to you, but now he is indeed useful to you and to me.)
korean_text: 그가 전에는 네게 무익하였으나 이제는 나와 네게 유익하므로

sentences.original_text: Formerly he was useless to you
but now he is indeed useful to you and to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제는 그가 당신과 나에게 정말 쓸모있습니다
